subject: Handbreak
description_text:
I'm not getting a response from Simsonn through Ali express, currently only able to connect partially on one computer. Freejoy detects but cannot adjust and reads "incompatible firmware" any assistance would be appreciated, thank you.

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

conversations.body_text: Hi scott krause,     Have you already downloaded and installed SIMSONN Manager version 2.0.9? Additionally, please send us screenshots of the following:    The SIMSONN Manager 2.0.9 interface    The SIMSONN device as shown in the VKB tool    I’ll review the screenshots to help identify the issue.     https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download     https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0551/4739/7238/files/VKB_JoyTester_40fdd530-6057-437e-9b50-3ac2d59dbbcd.zip?v=1693176246
Hi scott krause,    Please open the VKB tool, select the SIMSONN device from the bottom section of the interface, and send us a screenshot.

Hi scott krause,    Please download and install the Todesk tool — no registration is required. If the software prompts you to register, simply click the “X” in the upper-right corner to enter the main interface. Then, provide your ID and temporary password, and I will assist you remotely.  https://dl.todesk.com/windows/ToDesk_Setup.exe

Struggling with program, heres where im at
________________________________

Sorry, new password attached ^
________________________________

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi scott krause,    Please contact the AliExpress store directly. Our sales representative there will assist you, as she has your shipping address on file.

I works on my other computer, thank you for your time. I'll play around with some drivers to identify the issue as the problem is on my end. If you have any advice or tips I would appreciate it.

Your customer service is excellent and I appreciate your efforts and products. Thanks again and have a great day

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Hi scott krause,     You are using version 1.7.0. Before calibrating the pedals, please make sure to click "Read Config from Device" first. This ensures the current parameters from the device are correctly loaded and helps avoid calibration errors.   https://drive.google.com/file/d/18gJX8IJjW26C6rcE7DBnNAt4g_YOatP8/view?usp=sharing

I was told by your support team this was the app to use for my handbreak instead of simsonn manager. This app will not allow me to use the “read from device option” on one computer, while my other computer simply will not detect the device at all.

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Hi scott krause,   ​ You can provide a screenshot of the Freejoy tool so we can help you verify the device status. If the other device is not recognized, it's likely due to a driver issue or unstable USB power supply on your PC. We recommend avoiding USB hubs and connecting the device directly to the blue USB 3.0 port on the back of your computer for a more stable connection.
ID 为 1668 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单1668  
      主题: handbreak  
      描述:  
Hello, I am unable to select the handbreak for adjustment withing the simsonn manager app. Any assistance would be appreciated, thank you
Hi scott krause,     If there's an issue with the configuration file, you can use this handbrake .cfg file to restore it.

I will be sending photos from multiple computers, feeling it was a driver issue i have already attempted a full restore on computer #1

Computer #1 no connection

________________________________

Computer 2 after loading configuration file you sent

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi scott krause,     We recommend using Freejoy version 1.7.0.       https://drive.google.com/file/d/18gJX8IJjW26C6rcE7DBnNAt4g_YOatP8/view?usp=sharing

Fully functionall on computer #2!

Any recomendation to get it to work on computer #1? Its my main computer that I had inteded to use it on
________________________________

Im back to driver issue I guess,  any advice would be appreciated, im just happy to narrow down the issue is NOT the handbreak
________________________________
Hi scott krause,  Please try using a self-powered USB hub, as it ensures stable power supply to the device and helps prevent disconnection issues caused by insufficient power.

I’ll get one to see if it works, thank you for your time. You and your team have been extremely helpful. I may have to bother you guys in the near future if the self powered usb hub doesn’t work but it’s clear the devise is fully functional. Thank you and have a great day, I will definitely be getting/recommending  Simsonn products

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

Hi scott krause,  We’re glad to have been able to assist you! If you encounter any further issues, feel free to reach out to us at any time — we’re here to help!
